attributes.action: Please Consider the Small VAPOUR Business in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The TPD is what can only be considered a damaging exercise by the EU. 
To force people back to smoking and it will happen and once again increase the strain on the NHS. A Burden Vapour Vendors are fixing by giving an alternative product that is 95% Less Harmful. Please see attached link to a .gov page
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/e-cigarettes-around-95-less-harmful-than-tobacco-estimates-landmark-review
Please sign this Petition and stand up for us all in the UK Vaping Industry
attributes.background:
As a Small Vapour Business that produces e-liquids of some 300 Flavours and has employed 6 local people. We have found ourselves, at the point of destruction brought on by the EU TPD 20 Legislation in May.
We simply cant survive the TPD.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call for a clear action from the Government or Parliament. If you would like the Government to work with other EU member states to change these regulations, you could start a new petition asking for that.
